content: this legal case involves two parties sklep and vrhovno sodišče rs ii dor 3852022 on january 11 2023 a significant development occurred in the case but the details are not provided the case involves the exchange of data between the parties and lasted until january 11 2023 the court made a decision regarding the division of assets ruling that the plaintiff should receive 70 and the defendant should receive 30 the supreme court dismissed an application related to the case the case is based on the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the applicant claims coownership of a property and seeks payment for their share while the defendant claims equal ownership and seeks payment for their share the court of first instance made several errors in handling the case and the supreme court dismissed the application for revision

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 385/2022, 11. 1. 2023
